Docs.summary: This class supports the Visual Basic and functions.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class supports the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] `Print` and `PrintLine` functions. It is not intended to be used directly from your code.
For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileSystem.Print%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileSystem.PrintLine%2A>.
